block.p: BRAUNSCHWEIGER--Flora, 96, Hackensack, NJ and Aventura, FL. Wife of the late Leo, mother of the late Linda, survived by sons Leonard and Mark, daughter-in-law Leslie, sister of the late Albert, Walter and Herbert Frank. Graveside service 11am Friday, Mount Hope Cemetery, Westchester, NY. Donations Macular Degeneration Research, 22512 Gateway Center Drive, Clarksburg MD, 20871. For information Gutterman and Musicant 1-800-522-0588.
